ygData.messageBody:
At 08:32 PM 7/15/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>YOU HAVE MADE MY DAY!!!!!! Finally a new weapon, i'm so excited to get
>home. Hope charismatic carillon plus the dark elf illusion of the mask of
>the deceiver gets me there, i've never been to neriak. Might try a mule.
>We'll see, thanks so much for this post John!
>
>Shada
>

nonono, he made MY DAY!!! woohoo!! i was lusting after that stupid sword
electrum thingy since the lord never drops the silly ykesha sword. anybody
want any barbutes? if i see another barbute from that silly lord in guk im
gonna cry. ooo i gotta go log in now and that thing...
